colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES DPAL BCOM LDAN 'DAS SNYING 'DUS KUN BZANG SROG BDAG HE RU KA SOGS KYI DBANG DANG RJES GNANG SOGS KYI BLA MA'I BRGYUD RIM GYI GSOL 'DEBS RE BA SKONG BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA 'DI DANG RIM GNYIS DANG 'BREL BA'I SMON LAM DANG SHIS BRJOD 'DI RNAMS DAD PA DANG LDAN CING DAM TSIG GTZANG MA DANG RIGS RGYUD RIN TU MTHOB, SMAN RTZIS SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG LUGS LA SPYANGS PA DANG, NYAMS LEN LA BRTZON PA'I RTAG SBYOR DANG GUS SBYOR GYI TSUL LA MKHAS PA, LUGS BZUNG MKHYEN PA'I RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA BSTAN 'GRO PHAN BDE RTZA LAG DBANG PHYUG DAM PAR GYUR BA, `CHAN CHEM MAN DUR YA BAG CHE AER TE NI PI SHI RIL THU DZA SAG THU HANG, BCOM LDAN 'DAS SNYING 'DUS KUN BZANG SROG BDAG HE RU KA'I RNAL 'BYOR PA RDO RJE'I BKA' 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES LHA RDZAS DANG BCAS PA BSKUL BA LTAR DANG, YANG DE'I CHAB 'OG TU GTOGS PA'I BANGS RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA MDO SNGAGS GZHUNG LA SBYANGS PA @006B MI DMAN PA HOR TSA PI LEG THU, DBU MDZAD DAR RGYAS SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR YI DAM LHAG PA'I LHA 'DI'I RNAL 'BYOR PAR RLAB PA RIG 'DZIN TE TVA BADZRAS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
